numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that MLB has fewer players of color than any other league.
2. I think that this fact is due to years of racism and historical context in baseball.
3. I notice that NFL has the smallest proportion of coaches of color.
5. Many people of color play football.
6. I wonder whether these statistics will increase in the future.
7. I wonder whether these statistics will decrease in the future.
8. I wonder whether only some groups of people of color will have an increase or a decrease.
9. These numbers have increased for people of color.
10. I expect that these numbers will keep increasing.
11. This situation impacts me and my community.
12. This situation shows that all people are equal.
14. This situation shows that the world is not so bad.
15. The graph shows that people of color have more influence in sports.
16. The graph shows that more people of color participate in sports.
17. These people do activities that they love.
18. These people prove that they can do these activities.
